channel.title: Encrypted wallets in images for practice
channel.description:
The following images contain encrypted wallets that were used in the christmas 2017 giveaway contest
we upload them here just for people that want to practice
you will need the client (not QT) then go to `file > key to image > extract file key from image` then you will get a zip file which if you unzip will contain the private keys to a wallet
the BAY is withdrawn from them though ;-)
1st https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/address.dws?bSDuPz5h6ZWGa2KUR5kY1aAJh4VJ5LakBf.htm ![dzimbeck|319x319](upload://nNa2kngPq12eEtQUAmWxVeUPq5q.jpg)
2nd https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/address.dws?bVmjK42hGjPLJEgYPc9c3aR8sJayR8ZWfR.htm ![How-to-claim-christmas-surprise|666x500](upload://kT1iFaoozxzL0v1IaAg8NT1XKUt.jpg)
3rd https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/address.dws?bXNiYnqiFpo2n4HnbQG9nCyYRezzLLke9U.htm ![BitBay-King|320x499](upload://gND3uzIa9JitRuaYyzRyoqZeHDb.jpg)
4th https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/address.dws?bE67VLbmEgjrCyDxuMcwfFfrrQJDtUvYrM.htm ![Multisig-Poker-Table-1000px|690x390](upload://b68qc8yFokgXaHgeNya8zDY0Zvf.jpg)
5th has a private key in each of the following images https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/address.dws?bUgcfw7Qa9bnrzHTB3jNUMhvMTKKv7kKhf.htm ![clubs-4|340x500](upload://q3K21guhR1NuOBJVGfMviAWeotu.jpg)
![hearts-12|340x500](upload://oBsMXVHeDl7lSZ8BgWelekmkTyr.jpg)

item.title: Encrypted wallets in images for practice
item.dc:creator: @Munti Bjorn Alsos
item.description:
@Munti wrote:

Good idea!
I might refill all or some of those wallets with a few coins now and then.

Read full topic
item.source: Encrypted wallets in images for practice
